nodes.text: Lothar the Grouch is a Grouch who lived on the seventh moon of Zircon. He got R2-D2 to deliver a hologram message to Oscar the Grouch of Sesame Street.

Lothar appeared in a Star Wars cameo on the television show Sesame Street, which aired in 1980 (episode 1364). This episode was chronicled in Caravan of Courage: Star Wars on Television, an article written by Scott Chernoff that covered a range of Star Wars appearances on television.
